author: daniellehrner
content:
Yesterday we had a call about verkle tries and one topic that came up were archive nodes. It seems that with verkle tries it will be more complex than now to implement them. Does anybody have more insight on this?
I am not yet familiar enough with them to make an assumption how hard it would be to still keep the option of archive nodes.

author: kevaundray
content: Could you elaborate on which part of verkle tries gives you the impression that archive nodes will be harder to implement? Maybe it is the part about freezing the existing Patricia trie?

author: kevaundray
content: I would also personally be interested in the call logs if you have any
